title: These Empty Words
description: Poet Taylor Blake struggles to come to terms with a life and career that seems to be past its peak. Faced with eviction and the prospect of living a life he knows he won't enjoy, Taylor knows it is time to change.Then there's the box. Empty. Mysterious. The box consumes his mind. Is it a sign? A message? Or just a curious peculiarity with no real meaning?
author: Adrian Moore
